title: Online travel agency (OTA) booking confirmations
dataVerified: Traveler name, booking details, OTA booking reference, supplier confirmation
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake OTA bookings (scam booking sites). Domain binding verifies OTA (Booking.com, Expedia, Priceline). Supplier verification. Prevents booking modification fraud.
